Title: SI:7 Report: Fire From the Sky
Description:
Yeah, we found Amber, she's alive, and all that. That's about where the good news stops though.

Let's see if I can pick up where ol' Rell left off...
RewardText:
So, now you know why ol' Rell's all beat up.

<You detect a change in Sully's facial expression, and he quickly turns away. Is he... crying?>
